TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Cirakesay, title = Cirakesay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cirakesay} }

S.FORM: Cirakesay Itiniay i Fuli Cen no Hualien ko Cirakesay a niyaro', 58 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 124 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 82% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 102 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 18% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 22 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 77%, Tayal 1%, Bunun 3%, Seediq 1%.

Cirakesay Itiniay i Foli Cen no Hoalien ko Cirakesay a niyaro', 58 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 124 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 82% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 102 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 18% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 22 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 77%, Tayal 1%, Bonon 3%, Seediq 1%.
